response.summary:
Always interested in learning new technologies for software development and new trends in the IT field, specially on the back-end side of things.

Over 5 years of experience with Telecommunications and Banking sectors, developing software integration projects based on Oracle SOA Suite and Integration Cloud.
response.skills: SoapUI, Oracle SOA Suite, XML Schema, SOAP, HTML5, SQL, PL/SQL, Microsoft SQL Server, C#, JavaScript, Java, C++, Software Development, JSON, XML, Web Services, Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA), Integration, Oracle Service Bus, Middleware

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de soluciones tipo middleware y de integración con Oracle SOA Suite 12C (BPEL, OSB, JCA), Documentación de los mismos, Análisis de requerimientos, Redacción de requerimientos para desarrollo, análisis de entregas de software, Pruebas unitarias e integrales de Servicios+Operaciones bajo arquitectura SOA, Integración con APIs RESTful, Diseño y Mantenimiento Modelo Canónico de Datos con XSD y otros.
profile_positions.title: Consultor Semi Senior

profile_positions.description: Desarrollos en Oracle SOA Suite 12C, Documentación de los mismos, Análisis de requerimientos, Redacción de requerimientos para desarrollo, análisis de entregas de software, y otros.
profile_positions.title: Desarrollador Junior II

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
